inmis.advancement.baby_backpack.title: Goody Bag
inmis.advancement.ender_pouch.title: Ender Access
inmis.advancement.ender_pouch.descriptio: Sticking your hand inside this bag makes it appear inside your Enderchest...
inmis.advancement.frayed_backpack.title: Backpack Beginnings
inmis.advancement.frayed_backpack.descri: It's not much, but it's mine! Craft a Frayed Backpack to expand your inventory space.
inmis.advancement.plated_backpack.title: Leveling Up
inmis.advancement.plated_backpack.descri: Surround your Frayed Backpack with Iron Ingots to expand its storage capabilities.
inmis.advancement.gilded_backpack.title: Gilded Expansions
inmis.advancement.gilded_backpack.descri: Enhance your Plated Backpack by plating it with gold. Shiny!
inmis.advancement.bejeweled_backpack.des: Stick some rare gems on your Gilded Backpack to make it even shinier!
inmis.advancement.blazing_backpack.title: Fiery Alternatives
inmis.advancement.blazing_backpack.descr: Plate your backpack with Netherite to make it immune to fire & lava.
inmis.advancement.withered_backpack.desc: Enhance your shiny backpack with a trophy obtained by the desolate king.
inmis.advancement.endless_backpack.title: The End
inmis.advancement.endless_backpack.descr: Obtain the ultimate backpack, fueled by the power of The End.
